Verify that shader long variable names works fine if they are within 256 characters.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".

Test same long uniform name in both vertex shader and fragment shader
PASS gl is non-null.
PASS gl.getError() is gl.NO_ERROR
PASS prog is non-null.
PASS valueLoc is non-null.
PASS gl.getProgramParameter(prog, gl.ACTIVE_UNIFORMS) is 1
PASS activeUniform is non-null.
PASS activeUniform.type is gl.FLOAT
PASS activeUniform.size is 1
PASS activeUniform.name is 'value01234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890'
PASS drawing is correct
PASS gl.getError() is gl.NO_ERROR

Test long uniform array name
PASS gl is non-null.
PASS gl.getError() is gl.NO_ERROR
PASS prog is non-null.
PASS redLoc is non-null.
PASS greenLoc is non-null.
PASS gl.getProgramParameter(prog, gl.ACTIVE_UNIFORMS) is 1
PASS activeUniform is non-null.
PASS activeUniform.type is gl.FLOAT
PASS activeUniform.size is 2
PASS activeUniform.name is 'color01234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567[0]'
PASS drawing is correct
PASS gl.getError() is gl.NO_ERROR

Test long varying name
PASS gl is non-null.
PASS gl.getError() is gl.NO_ERROR
PASS prog is non-null.
PASS drawing is correct
PASS gl.getError() is gl.NO_ERROR

Test long local variable name
PASS gl is non-null.
PASS gl.getError() is gl.NO_ERROR
PASS prog is non-null.
PASS drawing is correct
PASS gl.getError() is gl.NO_ERROR

Test long attribute name
PASS gl is non-null.
PASS gl.getError() is gl.NO_ERROR
PASS prog is non-null.
PASS gl.getProgramParameter(prog, gl.ACTIVE_ATTRIBUTES) is 1
PASS activeAttrib is non-null.
PASS activeAttrib.size is 1
PASS activeAttrib.type is gl.FLOAT_VEC3
PASS activeAttrib.name is 'vPosition0123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456'
PASS drawing is correct
PASS gl.getError() is gl.NO_ERROR

PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
